creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
description: three flat, curved legs, pierced and carved into dragon shapes; central boss and locking cap decorated with shou characters; can be disassembled
marks:
Inscription

on underside of one leg and undersi
text: This fine ivory hat stand has curved legs that have been pierced and carved as archaic dragons. The central boss is decorated with three incised <I>shou<I> (long life) characters surrounded by a cap also carved with a <I>shou<I> character. Made to accompany a traveling scholar official, this stand is cleverly disguised with legs that lock in position by the bayonet fitting on the cap to provide a wide and stable stand for the hat. It is also dismountable to pack flat for safe traveling.
title: Hat Stand
